social-trader-follower.title: Social Trader
social-trader-follower.subtitle: Trade the market by copying the best traders on TokenSets.
social-trader-follower.to-trader-link: Learn more about becoming a trader.
social-trader-follower.find-a-set: Find a Set that fits your style
social-trader-follower.find-a-set-subtitle: From greed/fear strategies, to AI powered trading algos, browse through a selection of top trading strategies by Set’s premiere traders.
social-trader-follower.click-of-a-button: Trade like the best with a click of a button
social-trader-follower.click-of-a-button-subtitle: It’s never been easier to trade like your favorite traders. Buy a trader’s Set to copy all of the trades they make.
social-trader-follower.track-subtitle: Keep up to date with any price movement on your portfolio with TokenSet’s user friendly interface.
social-trader-follower.join-subtitle: Join other traders like you on the Set Twitter and Telegram Community.

social-trader-trader.title: All Traders
social-trader-trader.subtitle: Create your Set, trade for your followers, and get paid to trade.
social-trader-trader.create-your-business-description: Craft your strategies, build your Set, and accrue a fee each time someone buys your Set.
social-trader-trader.create-your-business-disclaimer: * The amount of money you can earn shown above is a hypothetical amount, and does not guarantee you will make this much in value as a trader.
social-trader-trader.create-your-business-disclaimer-2: * The annual payout shown above is calculated on the assumption of $10M of buy volume which is not a guaranteed amount of buy volume you may experience as a trader.

how-it-works.title: How it works
how-it-works.card-1-description: Make a Set that users can join to copy your trades.
how-it-works.card-2-description: Get people to join your Set with a click of a button.
how-it-works.card-3-description: Make good trades and get paid from followers who join your Set.

create-your-set.title: Create Your Set
create-your-set.description: Having people copy your trades has never been easier.
create-your-set.card-1-description: Choose between a growing number of assets to trade between.
create-your-set.card-2-description: Create your fee structure from a combination of different fee types.
create-your-set.card-3-description: Describe your strategy and brand your Set.
create-your-set.card-4-description: Run your strategy and rebalance on chain.

social-trader-trader.apply-footer: Apply to be a Social Trader
social-trader-trader.apply-footer-subtitle: Apply in just a few minutes
